subSections.title: Kanji
subSections.text: {{ja-kanji|grade=|rs=儿05}} <!-- Not a shinjitai kanji. See 兌 (U+514C) instead -->

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
# [[exchange]]
# [[convert]]
# [[dui]] (one of the trigrams of the [[I Ching]]: swamp, west)

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: This character lacks JIS support and is not used on its own. [[兌]] (U+514C) is used instead. However, 兑 is used as the component form of several {{w|jōyō kanji}} such as [[説]] [[税]] [[悦]] [[脱]] [[鋭]].
